item.title: Bangalore to Wayanad Solo Trip Plan
item.description: A solo trip from Bangalore to Wayanad can be a delightful experience, as you'll get to explore the natural beauty and tranquility of this hill station in Kerala. Here's a suggested itinerary for your journey: Route Bangalore -> Mysuru -> Gundlupete -> Wayanad -> Mysuru -> Bangalore Day 1: Bangalore to Wayanad Start your journey early in the morning from Bangal
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
